channel.title: appetizer on Mostly Harmless Cafe
channel.description: Recent content in appetizer on Mostly Harmless Cafe

item.title: Buffalo Chicken Dip
item.description: Ingredients: 2 cups shredded chicken 8 oz cream cheese (softened) ½ cup Frank’s Red Hot ½ cup ranch 1 block (roughly 6 oz) cheddar cheese (freshly grated) ½ cup blue cheese crumbles Instructions (chicken): Bring water to simmer. Place chicken in water, cover with lid, and leave for 45 minutes. Remove chicken, carve the meat, and shred using whatever works. Instructions (dip): Mix together cream cheese, hot sauce, and ranch. Mix in chicken.
